conbody.p: This document will go over the fundamentals of creating a instructional video. You will learn:

ul.li: The purpose of creating the videos and how they can be accessible to a variety of audiences and topics.
The various methods for creating an instructional video. This section will go over the various design qualities and communication strategies that you can use in your video.
Different results of instructional videos. You will learn what separates a good video from a video and the qualities of an effective video.
